title: Kindaichi Shounen no Jikenbo R
overview: High school student Hajime Kindaichi is the supposed grandson of famous private detective Kosuke Kindaichi. Visiting Hong Kong for a fashion event with Kindaichi, our hero's girlfriend Miyuki is captured by a stranger in a case of mistaken identity. The journey to save Miyuki itself leads to yet another crime case.This is the sequel to the original anime series "Kindaichi Shonen no Jikenbo" from 1996.
